responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[24F282B6434E981D3FBC5B9E3C7849C5]", "BD014CDC488B217532BE4696119E75B9", "Reconnaissance by force, mostly. I need you to push towards those ruins. First, clear out some of the lesser Clay Dwarves that are providing cover and swarming the approaches, give us some breathing room. Then, the critical part: you need to confront one of the Gilded. They\'re tough, so be ready for a real fight. Your main goal is to secure a piece of their golden armor plating, something with those runes intact. We need to get it to someone who can actually read this alien script.")
name: ANV_FTUE_0007_Commander_GrettaIronhand_10_Response
